name: Add new Facebook Lead Ads leads to ActiveCampaign as contacts
description: Effortlessly manage your leads with this powerful template that connects Facebook Lead Ads and ActiveCampaign. Every time a new lead is generated through your Facebook Lead Ads, Make will automatically create or update the corresponding contact in ActiveCampaign. This seamless integration ensures that your marketing efforts are streamlined, allowing you to nurture leads effectively and enhance your email marketing campaigns. Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to a more efficient workflow.
